message.content:
cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.SD 

This paper discusses the use of altmetrics in academia, which is relevant to several sub-categories in computer science. The most likely sub-category is cs.DL (Digital Libraries), as the paper focuses on the role of libraries in supporting the use of altmetrics. The paper also discusses information retrieval (cs.IR) and cybernetics (cs.CY) in the context of altmetrics. Additionally, the paper mentions social media (cs.SI) and scholarly communication (cs.SD) as areas where altmetrics are becoming increasingly important.
